title: Libft
description:
My very own first library ! First project of the 42 cursus. A library of utilities using only write(), malloc(), and free().
Bonus part about chained lists.

title: Ft_printf
description: Recoding the printf function, with less options. An introduction to variadic functions.

title: Get_next_line
description: Get the next line ! A function thet returns a line from a file. This project is about buffer management and memory allocation in C.

title: Push_Swap
description:
An introduction to the wonderful world of sorting algorithms !

The goal is to sort a stack of numbers by rotating it and pushing numbers to and from another stack. 

Also linked lists.

title: Pipex
description:
Recode the pipe | from bash in a C program. 

This project is about child processes and pipes. 

Took me a while.

title: So_long
description:
My first mini-game in C !

A 2D platformer with a very basic event handling and window management part. An opportunity to get into larger work environments. 

Its quite fun !

title: Philosophers
description:
An introduction to concurrent programming. 

The dining philosophers problems is a classic illustration of multiple threads simultaneously trying to access the same data. It poses a lot of challenges and its pretty fun to do !

title: Old Portfolio
description:
My old portfolio containing mostly graphical projects using the P5.js library and a few other tools. 

This library, and a lot of dan shiffman's tutorials are how i got into programming and will always have a special place in my heart.
